_sText:
"LoL this map is fun!" More than 90% of people playing this map say that the map is a big fun. Description There is the "deathwheel" in the middle of the map. It rotates and randomly moves to an area. The one who touches it looses (dies). There are 3 levels of difficulty. 1st level: It moves for about 1 second and idles up to 8 seconds
2nd level: It moves for 3 seconds and idles up to 5 seconds. The level starts after 1 minute.
3rd level: Same as the 2nd level, but the wheel gets a turbo every 5 seconds. Credits The music: Zombie Nation - Kraftwerk 400 Special thanks to Knister for some ideas and looping the backgroundmusic. EDIT: This map is FINAL now It has 30 SPAWNS and some fixed physic bugs. Also the 3rd level got fixed and can now be enjoyed very well.
